scripts.build: babel src/index.js --out-file index.js && babel src/lib/util.js --out-file lib/util.js && babel src/lib/get-bili-data.js --out-file lib/get-bili-data.js && babel src/lib/bangumi-generator.js --out-file lib/bangumi-generator.js && babel src/lib/templates/index.js --out-file lib/templates/index.js --presets minify && babel src/lib/templates/pagination.js --out-file lib/templates/pagination.js --presets minify && cleancss src/lib/templates/index.css -O2 -o lib/templates/index.css
